ARABIC: لَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ رَهْبَةً فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You are a greater cause of terror in their breasts than Allah! That is because they are people who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely they have greater fear of you in their hearts than of God, because they do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely they have greater dread for you in their hearts than for Allah. That is because they are a people who are devoid of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They are more afraid of you than of God. They are a people who lack understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed in their hearts is a greater fear of you than that of Allah; this is because they are a people who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, you are more fearful in their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who comprehend not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You are certainly greater in being feared in their hearts than Allah; that is because they are a people who do not understand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Why, you arouse greater fear in their hearts than God; that is because they are a people who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ye are more awful as a fear in their bosoms than Allah. That is because they are a folk who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They are more in dread of you than of God, because they are people devoid of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Surely ye are more awful in their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed they have a greater awe of you in their hearts than of Allah. That is because they are a lot who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of a truth ye are stronger (than they) because of the terror in their hearts, (sent) by Allah. This is because they are men devoid of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, you (believers in the Oneness of Allah - Islamic Monotheism) are more awful as a fear in their (Jews of Bani An-Nadir) breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who comprehend not (the Majesty and Power of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Their fear of you in their hearts is greater than their fear of Allah; that is because they are a people who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Fear of you is more intense in their hearts than fear of God. That is because they are a people who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [59:13] You indeed arouse greater awe, fear, in their hearts, that is, [the hearts of] the hypocrites, than God — [but only] because He has deferred His chastisement [to the Hereafter]. That is because they are a people who do not comprehend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then said to the believers: (Ye are more awful as a fear in their bosoms than Allah) He says: the fear of the Jews and hypocrites of the swords of Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions is greater than their fear of Allah. (That) fear (is because they are a folk who understand not) the command of Allah or Allah's divine Oneness.
